added: In 2004, the founder of the New York based [[Nuwaubian Nation]], [[Dwight York]], was sentenced to 135 years for child molestation and racketeering.<ref name="Menjor">{{Cite web|url=https://www.liberianobserver.com/news/mixup-at-u-s-bureau-of-prisons-over-identity-of-dr-malachi-york-and-son-dwight/|title=Mixup at U.S. Bureau of Prisons over Identity of Dr. Malachi York and Son, Dwight|last=Menjor|first=David S.|date=September 28, 2018|website=Liberian Observer|language=en-US|access-date=September 2, 2019}}</ref><ref name= "Palmer Nation">{{Cite book | url= https://books.google.com/books?id=wZuoDQAAQBAJ| title=The Nuwaubian Nation: Black Spirituality and State Control| isbn= 9780754662556| last1=Palmer| first1=Susan| publisher= Ashgate New Religions |year= 2010}}</ref>
